title: Creates the Mature Workers Support Program
summary: Creates the Mature Workers Support Program.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          472

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A. DINOWITZ, JAFFEE, ROBINSON, GUNTHER, MILLMAN,
         LUPARDO, N. RIVERA,  CASTRO,  SCARBOROUGH,  MAISEL,  GIBSON,  BOYLAND,
         HEVESI,  J. RIVERA  --  Multi-Sponsored  by  -- M. of A. ABBATE, COOK,
         CRESPO, DESTITO, GOTTFRIED, MARKEY, McENENY, McKEVITT -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Aging

       AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to creating the mature  work-
         ers support program

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The elder law is amended by adding a new article 3 to  read
    2  as follows:
    3                                 ARTICLE III
    4                       MATURE WORKERS SUPPORT PROGRAM
    5  SECTION 301. MATURE WORKERS SUPPORT PROGRAM.
    6    S  301.  MATURE  WORKERS  SUPPORT  PROGRAM.  1.  THE  OFFICE SHALL, IN
    7  CONJUNCTION WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR, DEVELOP AND UPDATE ON AN ANNU-
    8  AL BASIS A GUIDE FOR BUSINESSES FOR  HIRING,  RETAINING  AND  RETRAINING
    9  MATURE WORKERS IN NEW YORK STATE THAT IS BASED ON THE MOST RECENT RECOM-
   10  MENDATIONS MADE BY THE MATURE WORKER TASK FORCE.
   11    2.   SUCH GUIDE SHALL BE PLACED ON THE WEBSITES OF THE OFFICE, DEPART-
   12  MENT OF LABOR, AND DEPARTMENT OF STATE. BUSINESSES THAT  OBTAIN  CERTIF-
   13  ICATION OR LICENSURE FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR OR DEPARTMENT OF STATE
   14  SHALL  BE  PROVIDED  WITH  A  LINK  TO  THIS GUIDE, OR A PAPER COPY UPON
   15  REQUEST, WHEN THEY APPLY FOR SUCH CERTIFICATION OR LICENSURE. A  NOMINAL
   16  FEE  MAY BE CHARGED FOR PAPER COPIES PROVIDED TO INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE NOT
   17  BUSINESS OWNERS.
   18    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04536-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to creating the mature workers support program
